Tucson gently chuckles.  He fully agreed with Talon.  

"Can't - Argue with=
 you on that.  At least becomming - A Prime has made me learn how to curb m=
y impulsiveness and my - temper somewhat.  Yet, I suppose part of the old m=
e is still not going to give up fighting for what he believes in.  And that=
's Freedom for all who deserve it.  And - justice for those, who have taken=
 it away.  That is all I want, and hope for."

He sighs while pausing.

" E=
ventually I - would like to see this planet become peaceful.  A world where=
 no one has to worry about dictatorship or slavory. And most of all, not ha=
ve to worry about ever being wrongfully tormented by neither Predacon, or D=
ecepticon.  I - trust Char is still an existing terrestrial planet...  I wi=
ll have to - research that in depth..  It - would be a fitting place for th=
e Predacons and Decepticons.  And if I - have to assert myself to get them =
to submit to my demands, I - will."

Straight Shot looks to Tucson's vitals=
 while in the cab with Talon.

"Hey, careful, don't excite yourself so much=
.  Your energy levels are dropping really fast, try ta save yourself so you=
 don't go off line okay?"

Tucson replies.

"Of course.  You're - right Str=
aight Shot."

Straight Shot looks to Talon.

" I so admire you for putting =
up with his stubborn behavior."

Tucson grumbles.

"Heeyyy.."

Straight Sho=
t eyes him.

" Ah, ah, ahh, I'm right and you know it.  So don't go grumbli=
ng at me.  And for Primus' sake, listen ta Talon will ya?!"

He replies.

"=
Well do."

Rat Trap now finds the perfect opportunity to drop in on Tucson'=
s cab, and then finds his way inside on the driver's side, as he sits on th=
e dash board.

"Whoops, sorry, hope I didn't obstruct your view.  Hey, how'=
s it gon' Wheels?  Geeze, you're losn' energy really fast, where's the ener=
gy leak commn' from?"

Straight Shot looks to him.

"His arm, Hydras bit hi=
m and now he's leaking battery fluid rapidly. But now he's transformed so i=
t's hard ta tell where it's coming from."

Rat Trap widens his eyes.

"Ohh =
scrap, a battery fluid leak is bad news.  Hey, maybe I can find it and kind=
a slow it down enough ta get the big guy back ta base. Hang on Wheels, I sa=
ved ya once, I can do it again."

He scrambles out and looks for the leak. =
 He finds it at the head of Tucson's right driver's side front wheel axle.
=

"Got it, Ohh it's a biggie.  I see a few severed lines down here, but I kn=
ow I can patch these up temporarilly ta stop the leaks, until he gets back =
ta the Ark for repairs."

Night Shift drives up to him, and with a special =
grappler hook, he hands him a special metallic tape.

"Need this?"

Rat Tra=
p nodds.

"Yep, that's the stuff, thanks Night Shift.  Okaay, I'm not reall=
y good at this but it'll hold 'em over."

Rat Trap now tapes up the wound, =
to slow the bleeding.
